charges.charge_description: The defendants, ALFREDO GONZALEZ, RAMON RODRIGUEZ, FERNANDO DIAZ, and PEDRO PARRA-CARDENAS, knowingly and intentionally combined, conspired, confederated and agreed together and with each other, and with other persons known and unknown, to distribute 500 grams or more of a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance, all in violation of Title 21, United States Code, Sections 841(a)(1), (b)(1)(A) and 846.

The defendants, ALFREDO GONZALEZ, RAMON RODRIGUEZ, FERNANDO DIAZ, and PEDRO PARRA-CARDENAS, knowingly and intentionally combined, conspired, confederated and agreed together and with each other, and with other persons known and unknown, to distribute 500 grams or more of a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance, all in violation of Title 21, United States Code, Sections 841(a)(1), (b)(1)(A) and 846.

The defendants, ALFREDO GONZALEZ, RAMON RODRIGUEZ, FERNANDO DIAZ, and PEDRO PARRA-CARDENAS, knowingly and intentionally combined, conspired, confederated and agreed together and with each other, and with other persons known and unknown, to distribute 500 grams or more of a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance, all in violation of Title 21, United States Code, Sections 841(a)(1), (b)(1)(A) and 846.

The defendants, ALFREDO GONZALEZ, RAMON RODRIGUEZ, FERNANDO DIAZ, and PEDRO PARRA-CARDENAS, knowingly and intentionally combined, conspired, confederated and agreed together and with each other, and with other persons known and unknown, to distribute 500 grams or more of a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance, all in violation of Title 21, United States Code, Sections 841(a)(1), (b)(1)(A) and 846.
